description: Savor tropical sweetness and zesty hibiscus notes, wrapped in a crispy potato shell. Celebrating National Day with flavors of Saint Lucia's culinary heritage.
Did you know jalapeos are native to Central Mexico? Their fiery flavor adds a spicy kick to today's Jalapeo tortilla chips.
Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by the rich flavors and traditions of the Netherlands - home to one of the world's most beloved cheeses: Gouda.
